snippet: Citizens in China, Egypt, France, South Africa and Brazil on Obama vs. Romney -- and The New York Times's Susan Chira on what the outcome of the election will mean for U.S. relations with China and Syria.
abstract: Citizens in China, Egypt, France, South Africa and Brazil on Obama vs. Romney -- and The New York Times's Susan Chira on what the outcome of the election will mean for U.S. relations with China and Syria.

headline.main: What President Obama or President Romney Would Mean for the World
